verses.text:
God loves the lit-tle spar-rows, I'll gone His ten-der care; If God so loves the lit-tle birds, I know He loves me, too.
He paints the lil-y so fair, He feeds the rav-en on the tree, I know He loves me, too.
God made the lit-tle chil-dren, And lit-tle lambs He guards and small; He'll not forget His lit-tle ones, I know He loves them all.

chorus.text: He loves me, too, he loves me, too, I know he loves me, too; Be-cause he loves the lit-tle-ones, I know he loves me, too.
